app-footer.description: An interoperability protocol for the next generation of multi-chain assets & identities

home-hero-section.title: Privacy First Social Protocol
home-hero-section.description: Rarimo seamlessly combines various identity standards and allows the formation of private but verifiable history of their use and relations

main.subtitle: What is rarimo?
main.title: Interoperability for identity and social components across multiple networks
main.description: Protocol is based on Tendermint & Cosmos SDK and supports EVM-compatible smart contracts
main.easy-solutions-text: Bundle transactions for fewer fees, signatures, and seamless experience
main.decentralized-network-text: Unlimited blockchains, validators, and core for seamless connectivity
main.security-text: Threshold signatures ensure high security with constant transfer price

identity.title: Identity Protocol
identity.description: Rarimo allows creating zkp-based digital identity with portability across connected chains
identity.zk-proofs-text: to maintain privacy while providing information about user identity
identity.state-replication-text: Published credentials can be verified on any chain, eliminating extra integrations
identity.instant-finality-text: enables seamless bridging of identity data on Rarimo after publishing

bridging.title: Bridging Protocol
bridging.description: Rarimo is able to transfer or mint assets and states across-chains
bridging.fungible-token-text: bridging enables custom logic inclusion and single signature execution across chains
bridging.nft-and-sbt-text: On-demand feature empowers users to choose their desired network for claims
bridging.identity-states-accent: Identity states and Social Graph Snapshots
bridging.identity-states-text: - Oracles parse existing identifiers on connected networks and bridge states

use-cases-section.title: Featured use cases
use-cases-section.mints-text: Issue non-fungible tokens (NFTs) or SBTs on any chain
use-cases-section.gaming-profiles-text: Build out player profile that can be used by third-party dApps
use-cases-section.ssi-text: Use data in the web3 world using ZK-proofs for identity verification
use-cases-section.nft-checkout-text: Allow users to purchase NFTs with ANY crypto on any chain with a single signature
use-cases-section.token-agnostic-text: Users can pay for transactions with their preferred tokens
use-cases-section.social-graphs-text: A cost-efficient way to propagate social graph state between different chains
use-cases-section.name-servers-text: Issue credentials for the users and build their social identity

news-section.title: Latest news
news-section.first-title: Polygon ID comes to Ethereum thanks to Rarimo integration, more chains to come
news-section.second-title: NFT marketplace enables cross-chain purchases on multiple networks
news-section.third-title: Blockchain-infused AI could save Drake's voice, or your average Joe's data
news-section.fourth-title: Rarimo: an interoperability protocol for the decentralized social identity
news-section.five-title: What is Interoperability, and why is it so important?
news-section.eighth-title: Proof of humanity’ plug-in for crypto apps launched by Rarimo
news-section.ninth-title: Enabling identity management on MetaMask wallet

subscribe-section.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
subscribe-section.description: Stay up-to-date about new features and supported apps

community-section.title: Start building with Rarimo
community-section.description: Our community is here to help! Enjoy support tailored to the unique needs of your project
community-section.support-desc: Make your engineering workflow more efficient
community-section.discord-desc: Connect with like-minded community for support and inspiration

nft-checkout-hero-section.title: NFT Checkout
nft-checkout-hero-section.description: Allow users to purchase NFTs with ANY crypto on any chain

advantages-section.single-signature: Single signature to execute the entire flow
advantages-section.merge-tokens: Merge multiple tokens for a single payment
advantages-section.gas-fee: Flexibility on gas fee payment options
advantages-section.best-price: Best Price discovery via Multiple DEX

implementation-section.description: The react component connects seamlessly with your Dapp or a Marketplace
implementation-section.acceptable-text: Define acceptable chain & token for the marketplace
implementation-section.transaction-building-text: Transaction building, wallet signs are handled by the component
implementation-section.testing-mode-text: Testing & debugging modes for local development
